@georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire So the error is generated by the job status API trying to process the second file `Microsoft Word - 582764_4.DOC.pdf.ibdoc` . The file is not in your input folder  - do you have that pdf file somewhere?

@Erick - is it possible that this error is generated by Refiner backend when a file only exists in `s2_map_records` but not `s1_process_files`?
